21-000708 / Burglary / Weapons Law Violation. Subject (Non-GMU) was arrested andtransported to Fairfax County Adult Detention Center for entering an unlocked residencehall without permission and illegally carrying a concealed weapon. (31/Simkovitz)
21-000683 / Destruction of Property / Vandalism. Complainant (GMU) reportedintentional damage to a curb. (36/Gannon)
21-000675 / Hit and Run. Complainant (Non-GMU) reported a hit and run of a vehicle.(46/Morrison)
Case Number / Nature of Case / Brief Description / Officer Unit ID

21-000651 / Drug Law Violations / Liquor Law Violations / Medical Assist. Subject(GMU) was referred to Office of Student Conduct (OSC) for possessing illegal drugs andalcohol while under age 21 and transported to hospital for overconsumption of drugs oralcohol. Seven other Subjects (GMU) were referred to OSC for underage drinking.(42/Dillmuth)
